original_text: So Moses said to the Lord, ‘I am your servant. But you have given this problem to me! It seems that you are not pleased with me. You have given to me the hard job to be leader of all these people.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와께 여짜오되 어찌하여 주께서 종을 괴롭게 하시나이까 어찌하여 내게 주의 목전에서 은혜를 입게 아니하시고 이 모든 백성을 내게 맡기사 내가 그 짐을 지게 하시나이까

sentences.original_text: So Moses said to the Lord
But you have given this problem to me
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 이 문제를 저에게 주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: It seems that you are not pleased with me
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 저를 기쁘게 하지 않는 것 같습니다

sentences.original_text: You have given to me the hard job
to be leader of all these people
